properties.Name: UKLID
properties.description: The intersection of 36th Lane and Fields Road (CR-320). A ranch access road also joins this intersection from the southeast. The groundtrack from K12 direct UKLID approximately follows Fields Road along the north shore of Huerfano Lake. UKLID is 7.3nm from KPUB. UKLID is a Pueblo Tower inbound call point.

properties.Name: BRIDG
properties.description: The Interstate 25 bridges over Porter Creek. BRIDG is 7.6 nm northwest of KPUB and 2.9 nm west of the 960-ft TV antenna. BRIDG is a Pueblo Tower inbound call point. (Pronounced 'bridge.')

properties.Name: DALE
properties.description: The intersection of Business 50 and Avondale Blvd, near the Avondale town center. DALE is located directly south of the Chemical Depot south gate. DALE is 7.6 nm east of KPUB. DALE is a Pueblo Tower inbound call point.

properties.Name: SLUDG
properties.description: The intersection of Pueblo Blvd and the eastbound lanes of Highway 50. SLUDG is 8 nm directly west of KPUB. SLUDG is a Pueblo Tower inbound call point. (Pronounced 'sludge.')

properties.Name: CTPRK
properties.description: The intersection of Pueblo Blvd and Thatcher Avenue. Pueblo City Park is northeast of this intersection, and the Elmwood Golf Course is southeast of this intersection. CTPRK is a Pueblo Tower inbound call point. (Pronounced 'City Park.')

properties.Name: SULFR
properties.description: SULFR is the intersection of the D.O.T. Road and a ridgeline that runs along the western border of the Chemical Depot. Approaching SULFR inbound, look for two large deciduous trees on each side of the road near the ridgeline. SULFR is 7.6nm from KPUB. SULFR is a Pueblo Tower inbound call point. (Pronounced 'sulfur.')
